languages.text: "Жаль". {n}Навигатор расправляет плечи и подает знак страже.{/n} "Я надеялся обрести союзника в вашем лице, но вы лишь оттягиваете завершение этой печальной истории. Защищайтесь!"

traits.locale_text: "Жаль". {n}Навигатор расправляет плечи и подает знак страже.{/n} "Я надеялся обрести союзника в вашем лице, но вы лишь оттягиваете завершение этой печальной истории. Защищайтесь!"

languages.text: "Pity." {n}Felek squares his shoulders and gestures to his guards.{/n} "I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful end of your story. Prepare to die!"
languages.original_text: "Жаль". {n}Навигатор расправляет плечи и подает знак страже.{/n} "Я надеялся обрести союзника в вашем лице, но вы лишь оттягиваете завершение этой печальной истории. Защищайтесь!"

traits.locale_text: "Shame." {n}Felek squares his shoulders and gestures to his guards.{/n} "I was hoping to find an ally in you, but you are merely delaying the conclusion of this rueful story. Defend yourself!"
"Shame." {n}Felek squares his shoulders and gestures to his guards.{/n} "I was hoping to find an ally in you, but you are merely delaying the conclusion of this rueful story. Defend yourself!"
"Shame." {n}Felek squares his shoulders and gestures to his guards.{/n} "I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful end of your story. Defend yourself!"
"Shame." {n}Felek squares his shoulders and gestures to his guards.{/n} "I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful end of your story. Defend yourself!"
"Pity." {n}Felek squares his shoulders and gestures to his guards.{/n} "I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful end of your story. Prepare to die!"
"Pity." {n}Felek squares his shoulders and gestures to his guards.{/n} "I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful end of your story. Prepare to die!"

languages.text: "Ein Jammer." {n}Felek richtet sich auf und gibt seinen Wachen ein Zeichen.{/n} "Ich hatte gehofft, in Euch {mf|einen Verbündeten|eine Verbündete} zu finden, doch nun zögert Ihr das traurige Ende Eurer Geschichte nur heraus. Bereitet Euch auf den Tod vor!"
languages.original_text: "Pity." {n}Felek squares his shoulders and gestures to his guards.{/n} "I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful end of your story. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: "Schande." {n}Felek richtet sich auf und gibt seinen Wachen ein Zeichen.{/n} "Ich hatte gehofft, in Euch {mf|einen Verbündeten|eine Verbündete} zu finden, doch nun zögert Ihr das traurige Ende Eurer Geschichte nur heraus. Verteidigt Euch!"

languages.text: « Quel dommage... » {n}Felek redresse les épaules et fait un geste à ses gardes.{/n} « J'espérais que nous pourrions faire cause commune, mais vous ne faites que retarder le triste épilogue de votre histoire. Préparez-vous à mourir ! »
languages.original_text: "Pity." {n}Felek squares his shoulders and gestures to his guards.{/n} "I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful end of your story. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: « Quel dommage... » {n}Felek redresse les épaules et fait un geste à ses gardes.{/n} « J'espérais que nous pourrions faire cause commune, mais vous ne faites que retarder le triste épilogue de votre histoire. Défendez-vous ! »

languages.text: “真是遗憾。”{n}费雷克正了正肩膀，朝他的卫兵做了个手势。{/n}“我本以为您会成为我的盟友，可现在，您仅仅是在拖延必将到来的悲惨结局罢了。受死吧！”
languages.original_text: "Pity." {n}Felek squares his shoulders and gestures to his guards.{/n} "I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful end of your story. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: “真是遗憾。”{n}费雷克正了正肩膀，朝他的卫兵做了个手势。{/n}“我本以为您会成为我的盟友，可现在，您仅仅是在拖延必将到来的悲惨结局罢了。准备迎战吧！”

languages.text: 「残念だ」{n}フェレックは戦闘体制に入って、衛兵に合図を送る。{/n}「協力できればと思っていたがね。あなたは悲しい結末を先延ばししているだけにすぎない。覚悟しろ！」
languages.original_text: "Pity." {n}Felek squares his shoulders and gestures to his guards.{/n} "I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful end of your story. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: 「残念だ」{n}フェレックは戦闘体制に入って、兵士に合図を送る。{/n}「協力できればと思っていたがね。あなたの物語は悲しい結末を先延ばししているだけにすぎない。お覚悟を！」
「残念だ」{n}フェレックは戦闘体制に入って、衛兵に合図を送る。{/n}「協力できればと思っていたがね。あなたは悲しい結末を先延ばししているだけにすぎない。覚悟しろ！」

languages.text: «Una pena». {n}Felek endereza los hombros y gesticula hacia sus guardias.{/n} «Esperaba poder considerarl{mf|e|a} un{mf||a} aliad{mf|o|a}, pero ahora solo posterga el trágico fin de su historia. ¡Prepárese para morir!».
languages.original_text: "Pity." {n}Felek squares his shoulders and gestures to his guards.{/n} "I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful end of your story. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: «Una lástima». {n}Felek endereza los hombros y gesticula hacia sus guardias.{/n} «Esperaba poder considerarl{mf|e|a} un{mf||a} aliad{mf|o|a}, pero ahora solo posterga el trágico fin de su historia. ¡En guardia!».

languages.text: "Yazık." {n}Felek, omuzlarını dikleştirip korumalarına işaret ediyor.{/n} "Dost oluruz diye ummuştum ancak olmuyorsa da uzatmanın âlemi yok. Sonun geldi!"
languages.original_text: "Pity." {n}Felek squares his shoulders and gestures to his guards.{/n} "I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful end of your story. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: "Yazık." {n}Felek, omuzlarını dikleştirip korumalarına işaret ediyor.{/n} "Dost oluruz diye ummuştum ancak olmuyorsa da uzatmanın âlemi yok. Sonun geldi!"
